data.quote: Just because something doesn’t do what you planned it to do doesn’t mean it’s useless.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: If you try to fail, and succeed, which have you done?
data.author: George Carlin

data.quote: You can’t wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
data.author: A.A. Milne

data.quote: A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: Life is like a sewer… what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
data.author: Tom Lehrer

data.quote: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.
data.author: Isaac Asimov

data.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: When I hear somebody sigh, ‘Life is hard,’ I am always tempted to ask, ‘Compared to what?’
data.author: Sydney Harris

data.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
data.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

data.quote: If you’re going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now.
data.author: Marie Osmond

data.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
data.author: Roger Staubach

data.quote: Fear stops people from accomplishing their goals.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: The boundary between what can be and your life, is your ideas
data.author: Pat Waldron

data.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote:
There are three rules.
1. If you do not go after what you want, you will never have it.
2. If you do not ask, the answer will always be no.
3. If you do not step forward, you will remain in the same place.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small
data.author: Asim Premji

data.quote: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.
data.author: Charles D Gill

data.quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
data.author: Dr. Suess
